description.english: Torrentem is a parallel CPU/GPU multi-physics solver library developed in C++ to be the key driver in my PhD research. Developed for power and flexibility, it implements advanced numerical techniques such as RBVMS and stabilized finite element formulations, a level-set method, custom GPU-based linear solvers, and a mesh partitioning and MPI communication model for parallel CPU on multi-node HPCs. Currently closed source.
description.chinese: Torrentem 是使用 C++ 开发的并行 CPU/GPU 多物理场求解库，是我博士研究的核心驱动力。它强调性能与灵活性，实现了 RBVMS 与稳定化有限元等先进数值方法、水平集方法、自定义 GPU 线性求解器，以及用于多节点 HPC 的网格划分与 MPI 通信模型。目前尚未开源。

imageAlt.chinese: Torrentem 求解器的可视化结果

description.english: Ostium is a library to process and integrate geospatial data, designed to work with Torrentem.
description.chinese: Ostium 是用于处理与整合地理空间数据的库，可与 Torrentem 协同工作。

imageAlt.chinese: Ostium 数据整合流程示意图

description.english: Vadum provides visualisation tools for results generated by Torrentem.
description.chinese: Vadum 提供用于展示 Torrentem 结果的可视化工具。

imageAlt.english: Visual analytics dashboard created with Vadum
imageAlt.chinese: 使用 Vadum 创建的可视化分析界面

description.english: Stratum is a G-code generator for DLP and SLA photopolymerization printers, with build preparation tuned for Torrentem's simulation outputs.
description.chinese: Stratum 是面向 DLP 与 SLA 光聚合打印机的 G 代码生成器，其成形准备流程针对 Torrentem 的仿真结果进行了优化。
